Functions

int main (int argc, char *argv[])

Detailed Description

read parameterization and calculate parity projected energy of Slater determinant

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

Definition in file recalcenergyp.c.

int main ( int  argc,
char *  argv[] 
)

Definition at line 31 of file recalcenergyp.c.

References SlaterDet::A, backup(), calcObservablesParity(), calcSlaterDetAux(), Interaction::cm, createinfo(), fprintinfo(), fprintObservables(), initSlaterDetAux(), Int, moveboostorientSlaterDet(), Interaction::name, Parameterization::name, Para::name, normalizeSlaterDet(), P, par, Parameterization::ParainitSlaterDet, Parameterization::ParatoSlaterDet, Parameterization::Parawrite, Q, q, readInteractionfromFile(), readParafromFile(), writeSlaterDet(), and X.

{
  createinfo(argc, argv);

  int cm=1;
  int par=0;
  int overwrite=0;

  if (argc < 3) {
    fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction parafile\n"
            "\n   -p PARITY       project to parity"
            "\n   -o              overwrite parameter file\n",
            argv[0]);
    exit(-1);
  }

  int c;  
  while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "op:")) != -1)
    switch (c) {
    case 'o':
      overwrite = 1;
      break;
    case 'p':
      par = atoi(optarg);
      break;
    }
  
  char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
  char* parafile = argv[optind+1];

  Interaction Int;
  readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile);
  Int.cm = cm;

  Parameterization P;
  Para q;
  readParafromFile(&P, &q, parafile); 

  SlaterDet Q;
  SlaterDetAux X;

  P.ParainitSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
  initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
  P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);

  if (!par)
    par = (Q.A%2) ? -1 : +1;

  calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
  
  // orient SlaterDet
  moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);

  // normalize SlaterDet
  normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);

  // calculate the observables
  Observables Obs;
  calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);

  FILE* outfp;
  if (overwrite) {

    backup(parafile);
    fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
    if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
      fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
      exit(-1);
    }
  } else {
    outfp = stdout;
  }

  fprintinfo(outfp);

  fprintf(outfp, "\n# calculated %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
          "# using %s interaction\n", 
          cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, Int.name);

  fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);

  fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
  fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
  P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
 
  fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
  writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);

  if (overwrite) 
    fclose(outfp);

  return 0;
}
